splash.main_error: Some params are missing. Can't we go ahead
splash.main_error_sub: Something gone wrong opening the page

login.error_voucher_code_sub: It seems that your voucher code is not correct

social.auth_success_sub: Read the marketing disclaimer and in a few seconds you will be redirected
social.auth_error_sub: Something went wrong, the reasons could be the following: 1)The data entered may not be correct. 2)The voucher you are using could be expired. 3)You could have reached your maximum daily time. 4)You could have reached your maximum daily traffic.

email.error_code_sub: Something went wrong, please check your email address
email.auth_success_sub: In a few seconds you will be redirected
email.auth_error_sub: Something went wrong, the reasons could be the following: 1)The data entered may not be correct. 2)The voucher you are using could be expired. 3)You could have reached your maximum daily time. 4)You could have reached your maximum daily traffic.
email.we_are_sending_email_code: If you are not receiving the email, please disconnect from the WiFi network and then reconnect, then access your email and click on the link in the message to browse. Pay attention to the SPAM box!
email.not_code_explain: Is it the first time you are connecting to this Wi-Fi?

sms.error_code_sub: Something went wrong on sending password (please choose the right international prefix for your number or check you don't have reach the max sending SMS number)
sms.auth_success_sub: In a few seconds you will be redirected
sms.auth_error_sub: Something went wrong, the reasons could be the following: 1)The data entered may not be correct. 2)The voucher you are using could be expired. 3)You could have reached your maximum daily time. 4)You could have reached your maximum daily traffic.
sms.we_are_sending_sms_code: Use the same password also at the next access by clicking on the 'Enter with your password' button.
sms.not_code_explain: Is it the first time you are connecting to this Wi-Fi?
